definitions.definition: to go with someone or to be provided or exist at the same time as something:
examples: The course books are accompanied by four CDs.

definitions.definition: to show someone how to get to somewhere:
examples: Would you like me to accompany you to your room?

definitions.definition: to go with someone to a social event or to an entertainment:
examples: "May I accompany you to the ball?" he asked her.
